title: Review of Dell S2722QC USB-C 27 Inch 4K UHD (3840x2160) Monitor, 60Hz, IPS, 4ms, AMD FreeSync, 99% sRGB, HDR, Built-in Speakers, USB-C, 2x HDMI, 2x USB, 3 Year Warranty, Silver
description: This is a product review of the Review of Dell S2722QC USB-C 27 Inch 4K UHD (3840x2160) Monitor, 60Hz, IPS, 4ms, AMD FreeSync, 99% sRGB, HDR, Built-in Speakers, USB-C, 2x HDMI, 2x USB, 3 Year Warranty, Silver.

article_plan:
# Review of Dell S2722QC USB-C 27 Inch 4K UHD Monitor

## Introduction
- Brief overview of the Dell S2722QC monitor
- Mention of key features such as 4K UHD resolution, IPS panel, AMD FreeSync, HDR, and built-in speakers
- Introduction to the review and what readers can expect

## Design and Build Quality
- Description of the design of the monitor
- Discussion of the build quality and materials used
- Mention of any unique design features

## Display Quality
- Evaluation of the 4K UHD resolution and its impact on image quality
- Analysis of the IPS panel and color accuracy (99% sRGB)
- Discussion of HDR support and its effectiveness
- Comparison of viewing angles and brightness levels

## Performance
- Assessment of the 60Hz refresh rate and 4ms response time
- Evaluation of AMD FreeSync technology and its impact on gaming
- Mention of any input lag or ghosting issues

## Connectivity and Features
- Overview of the USB-C, HDMI, and USB ports available
- Discussion of any additional features such as picture modes or blue light filters
- Mention of the built-in speakers and their quality

## Warranty and Customer Support
- Information on the 3-year warranty provided by Dell
- Overview of Dell's customer support services
- Mention of any user experiences with warranty claims or support interactions

## Conclusion
- Summary of the review and key points discussed
- Recommendation on whether the Dell S2722QC monitor is worth purchasing
- Final thoughts and considerations for potential buyers
